name: Cookie Runner (Ickise)
description:
Cookie Runner is a multiplayer game, maximum 2 players. One will control the teaser and the other one the player.

We decided to give to the player a choice by combining helping and hindering. Either, the player controlling the tease decides tlead his friend in order to the exit by collecting the cookies, or he puts obstacles in his way by blocking the exit as much as possible.

Credits:

Matthys Degroote: Game Developper

Enzo Dufour: Game Designer / Game Developper / Level Designer
